text: February 22, 2018 / 7:17 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-EMD Serono Says Health Canada Approves BAVENCIO For Treating Metastatic Merkel Cell Carcinoma Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 22 (Reuters) - EMD Serono: * EMD SERONO - CO, PFIZER CANADA ANNOUNCE HEALTH CANADA APPROVAL FOR BAVENCIO FOR TREATING METASTATIC MERKEL CELL CARCINOMA IN PREVIOUSLY TREATED ADULTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
